You review the model documentation provided by a model developer as part of the formal validation process.

## Prerequisites

- You hold the `Validator` role.[^1]
- A model developer has submitted model documentation for review.[^2]

## Key concepts

{{< include /about/glossary/validation_reports/_review.qmd >}}

## Document Overview

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

{{< include /guide/model-documentation/_review-model-documentation.qmd >}}

#### Unresolved conversations
Hover over **{{< fa comment-dots >}} # Unresolved conversations** to see a preview of the unresolved conversation associated with the documentation section.

Resolve conversations directly from this popup, or click to expand the conversation.

#### Model findings
Hover over **{{< fa triangle-exclamation >}} # Model Findings** to see a preview of model findings associated with the documentation section.

Click to expand the finding. 

#### Completion status
The **{{< fa check >}} #/# Done** indicator reflects the completion status of your documentation sections.

### Recent activity
At the bottom of the Document Overview page, you will also see quick view of any documentation activity. 

Click on **{{< fa eye >}} See all Activity** to be taken to the **Model Activity** page.
